definition: to name/to be named/to christen/to seek fame
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: I named the entire activity "blued books".
sentences.chinese: 我爲整個活動取名爲《藍色圖書》。

sentences.english: RollAboard He invented--he called it the RollAboard.
sentences.chinese: 是他發明的，並且取名爲。

sentences.english: Lotus reincarnation reaches poor Home He, name element daughter.
sentences.chinese: 荷花投胎至貧苦的何家，取名素女。

sentences.english: The town is in the mountains, named "mountain town".
sentences.chinese: 該城鎮修建在羣山之中，故取名“山城”。

sentences.english: They were up on Mesa Verde. Spanish explorers had named the area.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙探險者已經給這一片地區取名爲梅薩維德。

sentences.english: The boy was named George after his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子隨他舅父的名子取名喬治。

sentences.english: The process of naming is anything but linear.
sentences.chinese: 取名字的過程不可能是一層不變的。

sentences.english: It was named after the Swedish physicist Anders Angstrom.
sentences.chinese: 它取名於瑞典物理學家埃格斯特朗。

sentences.english: Many Ontario universities announce first round admission decisions later in the month.
sentences.chinese: 大部分安省大學將於四月底公佈第一輪錄取名單。

sentences.english: He named him Falcão, in honour of the legendary Brazilian.
sentences.chinese: 給他取名爲法爾考，與巴西傳奇同名。

sentences.english: Because of its long rectangular shape, with pig intestines similar, so called rice rolls.
sentences.chinese: 因其形狀爲長條形，與豬腸相似，故取名腸粉。

sentences.english: The child was christened Peter after his grandfather.
sentences.chinese: 這個孩子在受洗禮時按照他祖父的名字而取名彼得。

sentences.english: If you must give me a name, call me 2)hobgoblin.
sentences.chinese: 如果你非得給我取名，就叫我小妖吧。

sentences.english: The song was entitled"Coming Through the Rge".
sentences.chinese: 這首歌取名爲《穿過拉斯》。

definition: to name/to christen/to take a name
pet name for a child/childhood name
to give a name to/to dub/to christen/to designate/named after/naming
name (of a person or thing)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to shout/to call/to order/to ask/to be called/by (indicates agent in the passive mood)
pet name for a child/infant name
to be called/to be known as
stage name (of an actor or actress)
refined appelation/(humor) sb's elegant monicker/(hon.) your esteemed name
